body_html:
Sorry for the trouble and thanks for catching it. Yup, that generate script does assume a single directory in GOPATH.

Contributions to fix this are welcome, as are ideas to make the whole process smoother.
(For example, avoiding the need for go generate by committing the generated code to the git repository is something we're thinking of but haven't started on)
body_text:
Sorry for the trouble and thanks for catching it. Yup, that generate script does assume a single directory in GOPATH.
Contributions to fix this are welcome, as are ideas to make the whole process smoother.
(For example, avoiding the need for go generate by committing the generated code to the git repository is something we're thinking of but haven't started on)
body:
Sorry for the trouble and thanks for catching it. Yup, that generate script does assume a single directory in GOPATH. 

Contributions to fix this are welcome, as are ideas to make the whole process smoother.
(For example, avoiding the need for `go generate` by committing the generated code to the git repository is something we're thinking of but haven't started on)
